page.title: 11 ATTITUDES TO YOUTH CULTURE
page.content:
We took a cross-section of typical secondary school boys as to their attitudes towards music and fashion.60 boys were interviewed.
CONFORMATIVE:(jeans,t-shirts,jumpers) =33 boys out of 60. IN AT THE TIME:(fashion at the time) =12 boys out of 60. CASUALS:(sports clothes e.t.c.) =11 boys out of 60. HEAVY METAL/HIPPIES:(denim jackets etc) =2 BOYS OUT OF 60. INDIVIDUAL:(follow no set fashion) =2 boys out of 60. Most of the conformers to like progessive rock and pop.Most of the casuals liked electro/break dance.Most of the boys following changing fashion liked pop,and those who were individuals,l;iked new wave music.
